title: Bans in ARURF
body: I personally love the concept of ARURF, however i have to vs the same champs almost every game and they are basically a guaranteed win for whichever team has them, these champs are: Jayce, veigar,Karma,ahri it's just not fun to play against. i personally think the solution would be to add bans to future ARURF's

replies.body:
The problem with ALL RANDOM URF is that is not exactly ALL RANDOM.

Theres over 140 champions in the game and I swear it's a pool of only 30-40 that get chosen for you. Always seeing the same champions.
I played dozens and dozens of URF and if there wasn't a Jayce, Garen, Hec, Ahri or Wukong in the queue it was because I wasn't playing URF :P

Awesome mode, but needs to include the ENTIRE pool, OP or not, give everyone a ban choice to ban 10 per game, and make sure no one can roll the same champ for the next 5 games or something.

Literally just talking about this with someone the other day. I love ARURF. It needs to be random to stop the same champs being spammed because they're more OP in URF, but there's some champions I just do NOT want to deal with. I'd be 100% more inclined to play so much more URF if I could ban.
